import React from 'react'; import './Team.css'; import Nitin from './assets/nitin.png'; import Vijay from './assets/vijay.png'; import Yogesh from './assets/yogesh.png'; import Vaibhav from './assets/vaibhav.png'; export default function Team() { return (

We are a team of experienced fund managers, hardcore traders and expert techies that aspire to revolutionize the fund management ecosystem. Our philosophy is to simplify investing and apply core investment strategies to built consistent wealth along with a high margin of safety
